entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
